Row.Text: The Shawnee are consummate diplomats, who cross leagues on foot to bring together disparate groups even when facing catastrophic odds. Under the watchful eyes of the kispoko, the hoceepkileni call all who will come to the stomp grounds, to hear the orators speak, and to rise together, as one.

Where there is division, Tecumseh, you speak of unity, and where there is discord, you counsel sense. Bring peoples of all lands to you, great chief, that they may be stronger together, and weather the storms that are to come.
